bill.summary: 3/16/2005--Introduced. Calls upon the President to order an immediate moratorium on the rendition of persons to Syria and all countries that routinely use torture as reported by the Department of State's 2004 Country Reports on Human Rights Practices. Requests the President, the Secretary of State, the Secretary of Defense, and the Director of Central Intelligence to undertake a comprehensive review of U.S. renditions practice.
